sentences.sentence: He plays some passages so slowly that they become lugubrious.
sentences.translation: 有些段落他演奏得如此徐缓，听上去有些忧伤。

sentences.sentence: That long, lugubrious howl rose on the night air again!
sentences.translation: 夜空中又响起了那凄厉的长嚎！

sentences.sentence: Presently a dog set up a long, lugubrious howl just outside—within ten feet of them.
sentences.translation: 不一会儿，就在外面，离他们不到十英尺的地方，响起了一声又长又凄惨的狗叫声。
